title: Battery Temperature Impact Modeling
description: Extend physics engine to account for ambient temperature effects on battery performance and range. Cold weather reduces capacity by up to 40%, while hot weather affects discharge rates and longevity. Adds temperature slider (-20°C to 50°C) with real-time range/power adjustments.

tasks.description: Add ambientTemp field to ScooterConfig interface in types.ts
Add ambientTemp validation rule (-20 to 50) to validationRules in validators.ts
Add calculateTemperatureFactor function and integrate into calculatePerformance in physics.ts
Add ambientTemp to configKeys array in calculator.svelte.ts store
Add ambientTemp: 20 to all presets in presets.ts
Add temperature slider UI with range -20 to 50°C to BasicConfig.svelte
